com.github.p4535992.database.datasource.jooq.spring.config.exception

Class ExceptionTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooq.impl.DefaultExecuteListener
      • com.github.p4535992.database.datasource.jooq.spring.config.exception.ExceptionTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, org.jooq.ExecuteListener

    public class ExceptionTranslator
extends org.jooq.impl.DefaultExecuteListener
    Created by 4535992 on 01/01/2016. This class transforms SQLException into a Spring specific DataAccessException. The idea behind this is borrowed from Adam Zell's Gist
    Author:
    Petri Kainulainen, Adam Zell, Lukas Eder
    See Also:
    http://www.petrikainulainen.net/programming/jooq/using-jooq-with-spring-configuration/, https://gist.github.com/azell/5655888, Serialized Form
